name: Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?! (itch)
description:
Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?! is a wacky action RPG where YOU'RE the hero! Cook, craft, and toss around epic weapons, barrels of poison, and more as you fulfil your destiny!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299040/Holy_Potatoes_Im_A_Hero/
